metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11695 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in LibSass <3.5.3. A NULL pointer dereference was found in the function Sass::Expand::operator which could be leveraged by an attacker to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: libsass package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.5.5-2').
